text: John Jenkin, 23, had been sectioned after an apparent suicide attempt in the week before the double murder. His sister Katie and mother Alice McMeekin were found dead at their home in Millom.
title: Cumbria double murder : Son suspected of killing mother and sister 'had begged to stay locked up in mental hospital'
